titles.title: To direct the Inspector General of the Department of Transportation to submit to Congress a report relating to any structural defects in the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Bridge, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Office of the Inspector General for the Department of Transportation to report on its investigation of any structural defects in the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Bridge. The office must consult with the New York State Department of Transportation during its investigation.
